title: Privacy Policy
intro: At Rekapu, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains what data we collect (spoiler: almost nothing) and how we handle it.

tldr.title: TL;DR
points: All your data stays in your browser
No analytics, no ads, no third-party tracking

extension.title: Extension Data
extension.description: Rekapu stores all data locally in your browser using Chrome's IndexedDB storage. This includes:
extension.note: This data never leaves your device. We literally cannot access it.

website.title: Website Data
website.description: This website (rekapu.com) may use Cloudflare Analytics, which provides basic traffic statistics without tracking individual users. Cloudflare Analytics:
items: Does not track you across websites

tts.title: Text-to-Speech (Optional)
tts.description: If you choose to enable Text-to-Speech functionality and provide your own Google Cloud TTS API key, audio synthesis requests are sent directly to Google's servers. We do not:
items: Store or access your API key
tts.note: Your API key is stored only in your browser's local storage. Google's privacy policy applies to TTS requests you make using your API key.

chromeWebStore.title: Chrome Web Store
chromeWebStore.description: When you install Rekapu from the Chrome Web Store, Google may collect basic analytics such as:
chromeWebStore.note: This data is collected by Google, not by us. See Google's Chrome Web Store privacy policy for details.

permissions.title: Browser Permissions
permissions.description: Rekapu requires certain browser permissions to function:

items.reason: To save your flashcards, settings, and learning progress locally
To detect when you visit blocked domains
To display the question overlay on blocked sites
To block any domain you choose (you configure which domains to block)

permissions.note: These permissions are used only for extension functionality, never for tracking or data collection.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not share, sell, or transfer your data to anyone. Period.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Since all data is stored locally in your browser, you have complete control:
items: You can export your data at any time via the extension's backup feature
You can delete all data by uninstalling the extension or clearing browser data
Data persists only as long as you keep it in your browser

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: Since we don't collect your data, there's nothing for you to request access to or deletion of. You already have complete control over all your data in your browser.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: If we update this privacy policy, we'll post the new version on this page with an updated revision date. Since we don't collect email addresses, we can't notify you directly.

footer: By using Rekapu, you agree to this privacy policy.
